system.description: The character has mastered the art of aerial assault, using a jump pack to deliver devastating charges from above.
system.benefit: When making a Charge Action whilst wearing a Jump Pack, melee attacks deal an extra 1d10 Damage per Two Degrees of Success on their Weapon Skill Test, up to 2d10.

combat.condition: When charging with Jump Pack (+1d10 per 2 DoS, max 2d10)

specialAbilities.name: Jump Pack Charge
specialAbilities.description: When charging with a Jump Pack, deal an extra 1d10 damage per two Degrees of Success on your Weapon Skill Test (maximum 2d10).
